frg_createmeta

Create ENVI META files allowing access to time series of Med_SVI files

frg_createmeta(opts, out_files, force_update = FALSE)

Arguments

opts

list of options passed from frg_fullprocessing()
out_files

character names of raster files to be used to create the META
force_update

logical If TRUE, recreate the ROI file even if it already exist, default: FALSE

Value

The function is called for its side effects

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value

Author

Lorenzo Busetto, phD (2017) lbusett@gmail.com
